issue.title: [C++] Fix MakeBuilder to preserve ListType's field name
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4535](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4535). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
MakeBuilder doesn't preserve the field name in the given ListType.
I think this is a bug.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4535?focusedCommentId=16766073) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3619
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3619>
